name: Rise Of The Snails
description:
This game has it all. Snails, snails, snails in mech suits, and even a giant worm. If any of this interest you then do we have a game for you. Grapple around the planet and shoot all the snails you see. Colonize the snails planet with the use of your grapple-gun, upgrading it along the way. Even comes with a local high score board for all your high score needs!

Controls:

A/D - Left And Right

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Grapple

Escape  - Exit Game

Adding more power-ups tomorrow, don't worry. Suggest powerup ideas we can add!

- This is our first released game!

Made By: MagicWolfPlayz And Davynci
